title: Coins of the Deleted
outcome: Mysterious data-embedded coins linked to vanished citizens start appearing throughout the city. The coins stoke public outrage and bring the invisible population into the spotlight, destabilizing Council politics and sparking a grassroots truth-seeking movement.

events.description: A volunteer finds a coin embedded with data fragments of a missing citizen. The media seizes on the discovery, stoking citywide speculation and grief.
Multiple similar coins are discovered throughout Stenograd, each linked to profiles of citizens who had disappeared from BCI watchlists earlier in the year.
Families of the vanished organize mass rallies demanding answers, drawing thousands and bringing public pressure on the Council to investigate.
Innovators analyze the coin data and reveal evidence of intentional BCI archival manipulation, pointing indirectly to actions under Halden's authority.
A series of coordinated marches and public vigils calls for reopening BCI governance, with citizens and 'invisible' activists openly sharing stories and clues, shaking Council legitimacy.
